an10.121:4.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
an10.121:4.3: In the same way right view is the forerunner and precursor of wholesome qualities.
an10.121:4.5: Right view gives rise to right motivation. Right motivation gives rise to right speech. Right speech gives rise to right action. Right action gives rise to right livelihood. Right livelihood gives rise to right effort. Right effort gives rise to right mindfulness. Right mindfulness gives rise to right samādhi. Right samādhi gives rise to right knowledge. Right knowledge gives rise to right freedom.”
